data.message:
Read this as Eminem.

I just want the world to set into place.
It keeps spinnin and spinnin.
It keeps spinnin and spinnin.

Too much hate with all the race-
Says too much hate and I'm 
About to contemplate;
about how to send a message to all these haters who think that they are better cause they ain't. 
No better then the next Joe schmo in the bar at eight. This just ain't how the fuck I was raised. Equal rights shouldn't be hated it's a thing to embrace.

 You can be an alien from outer space, I wouldn't give a shit if you were gay or straight.
 Bi, no bye bye, I wouldn't say it to your different face. Getting along on this Earth is why we were even placed.
Open your mind and think real hard,
We are in outer space and this world,
It keeps spinnin and spinnin.
It keeps spinnin and spinnin.

To get this through to you I had to Rap it in a rainbow. Oops I mean wrap.
Don't say that's gay, that's just a rainbow tied in a lyric to get you to
feel like a homo. 
Oh no!  He said homo!
Let's freak out and panic.
Let's get all loud and frantic
Pass judgment and we can't stand it 

Looking at this world like,
It keeps spinnin and spinnin.
It keeps spinnin and spinnin.

replies.message: Thanks Adonis Garcia. 😀 thank you to all my likes. I felt it so I went with it.
Gotta find a better way to transition into that chorus more smoothly but nicely written. Props
Yeah, was thinking the same. Was slightly tired when writing it  Thanks for the opinion!
Is it crazy I can rap this in my head sounding exactly like Eminem's voice?

yeah. my intent was to let you guys fit his voice in however you seen fit to most move you. mostly wanted to inspire though. I  liked that Edward... We should battle some time about what we are most passionateabout. this was me playing around. I love how Scroobious pip explains word puzzles in his interviews. Em owns of course!

Fuck ur passion fruit cake u too soft u might catch a heart break gimmi a break see what this discussion might just take a pen pencil whatever i get i face to get ur mind spinnin this is the grim feedin out of the soul of kim and em damn thats to much andreline callin lucifer now think im missin him bully this faggot cuz he wont stop screamin ( i told not to get in em)  well its too late now im in yo body takin ur girl on a date with none on plate exept some shrooms x and duct tape oops (zzz) thought i need it took the shrooms feel like mario level completed exceed the weed toxicated the chronic the full album im turnt up on it but wait i smell vomit yo bitch havin a seizure (help) ahhhh nahh forget about it kept bumpin that casket till ma neck went looose fell right next to a empty bottle of grey goose woke up im middle of beirute and ma pants stolen by a gay dude / fuck em hahahaha

Haha yours made me laugh. You get A+. I'll have to share a darker one sometime. I can be down right twisted and scare people. I really softened mine up for general audience to enjoy but my passion for writing is like my talent for art. Skilled but not pro. This is my drawing..
And for my one year old nephew..
If u can incorporate Freddy with the Pooh and Tigger then you win the Internet today.  ☺️. And I like your verses.

Like a horror show of Freddy slaughtering the pooh gang? Or pooh gang having made honey out of Freddy? Lol.. would take me a few days to draw it.  Thanks for that... gave me many big ideas for new drawings of polar opposite genre art colliding together.
